text: Celebrity Big Brother (also called Celebrity Big Brother UK) is a reality television series in the United Kingdom which began in 2001. It is a Celebrity version of the Big Brother franchise. Contestants must complete challenges while living in a house full of cameras. In some series the house is in London; in some series it is in Hertfordshire. From 2001-2010, it was shown on Channel 4 and was presented by Davina McCall; from 2011-2018, it was shown on Channel 5 and was presented by Emma Willis; from 2024, it is shown on ITV2, ITV1 and ITVX and is presented by AJ Odudu and Will Best. == Format == A group of celebrities who don't know each other move into a house full of cameras. They are watched every day and are set challenges by a fictional character named "Big Brother". The contestants can speak to Big Brother privately in a room called the "diary room". They are not allowed to have contact with the outside world. Throughout the series, the public vote for who they want to evict and the last one remaining is the winner. === Eye === Every year, there is a different "Big Brother eye". ==Overview== Series Launch date Finale date Days Housemates Winner Channel ===Spin-offs=== Series Launch date Finale date Days Housemates Episodes Winner Channel ==Other websites== *Celebrity Big Brother at Channel5.com * Category:2001 British television series debuts Category:2000s British television series Category:2000s reality television series Category:2010s British television series Category:2010s reality television series Category:Channel 4 reality television programmes Category:Channel 5 (UK) television programmes Category:English-language television programs Category:Big Brother
title: Celebrity Big Brother (British TV series)
